Name: amtSandbox
Short Description: Testing; routes submission forms to sandbox instead of production

Name: BasePay
Short Description: Total pay for completion of the survey phase

Name: condition
Short Description: Quasi-experimental condition: 1='Without selective disclosure'; 2='With selective disclosure'

Name: connectivity
Short Description: Connectivity of the random graph at Time_0

Name: DemoStepPay
Short Description: Total pay for completion of the demographic survey phase

Name: MTurk
Short Description: true - MTurk sample; false - ResearchMatch sample

Name: NetStepPay
Short Description: Total pay for completion of the network phase - split over 10 rounds

Name: tieChoiceProb
Short Description: Probability that a tie is selected to update in a round

Name: Topic10_A
Short Description: Held out topic for uncertainty in 10th round

Name: Topic_HeldOut_Q
Short Description: Held out topic for uncertainty in 10th round

Name: Topic_HeldOut_A
Short Description: Held out question version for uncertainty in 10th round

Name: uncertainty
Short Description: Whether questions about projection on future topic are shown to participants

Name: waitTime
Short Description: Estimated lobby wait time in minutes
